products.title: Four seasons
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, ham, artichokes, olives and oregano.

products.title: Carbonara
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmesan, eggs, bacon.

products.title: Four cheeses
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmesan, gorgonzola cheese, artichokes and oregano.

products.title: Crudo
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella and parma ham.

products.title: Montanara
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, pepperoni and Strakkino (soft cheese).

products.title: Emiliana
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, eggplant, boiled potatoes and sausage.

products.title: Americano
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, sausage and French fries.

products.title: Sardinia
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, pecorino cheese and spicy salami.

products.title: Valtellina
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, bresaola, parmesan flakes and arugula.

products.title: Calzone
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, mushrooms, artichokes, anchovies and oregano.

products.title: Ortolana
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella and assorted vegetables.

products.title: The devil
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, spicy salami and chili.

products.title: Capriccioso
products.desc: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, artichokes, mushrooms and olives.
